refnamediv.refpurpose: Stores a file on the FTP server (non-blocking)

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
intftp_nb_put resourceftp_stream stringremote_file stringlocal_file intmode intstartpos0
ftp_nb_put stores a local file on the FTP server.
The difference between this function and the ftp_put is that this function uploads the file asynchronously, so your program can perform other operations while the file is being uploaded.

&reftitle.parameters;
ftp_stream
The link identifier of the FTP connection.
remote_file
The remote file path.
local_file
The local file path.
mode
The transfer mode. Must be either FTP_ASCII or FTP_BINARY.
